content.rendered:
The district has collaborated with WSWHE BOCES, to offer a STEAM Academy at Maple Avenue Middle School.  The program will run for three Saturdays on December 3, 10, 1 7 from 10:00 am – 12:00 p.m.

STEAM Academy has three course offerings for students in grades 3-8. All courses cost $100 and are held at Maple Ave Middle School in Saratoga Springs.
Visit https://www.wswheboces.org/apps/pages/CurrentCourses to view courses and register.
